title: Star Rank Hunter - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi
tags: Academy   Androids   Appearance Changes   Assassins   Beast Companions   Biochip   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Doctors   Eidetic Memory   Evolution   Firearms   Friendship   Futuristic Setting   Genetic Modifications   Genius Protagonist   Human Experimentation   Human Weapon   Inheritance   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Mysterious Past   Orphans   Outer Space   Overpowered Protagonist   Parasites   Pets   Pirates   Quirky Characters   Scientists   Special Abilities   Wealthy Characters
author: Chen Ci Lan Tiao   Lazy Cliché   陈词懒调
description:
The universe. This infinite field of stars is the dream of every Hunter.

For the Hunters who run amidst the stars, the only limit they truly have is the universe.

Is there a limit to the universe? And where would this limit lay?

When the Shadow Hunter; a young man named Cillin obtains a strange chip by accident, he begins his journey into this endless field of stars.>
